short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces mentions of Donald Trimp with - man with tiny hands

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replaces mentions of "Donald Trump" with "man with tiny hands".

Eg. "British Prime Minister Theresa May will become the first foreign leader to visit man with tiny hands in Washington since he became president."
